text: 8:3 Ua Me Ini 16:1-35; Matyu 4:4; Luk 4:4Ia uari fer arazim agɨvasa, a ia ataghizɨ, mɨtiriam ian azi. Egha a daghem mana, isa ia ganɨngizɨ ia aneme. Dagher kam, ia a gɨfozir puvatɨ, ezɨ ian inazir afeziaba uaghan fomɨra a gɨfozir puvatɨ. A ghaze, a kamaghɨn damightɨ ia fogh suam, e gumazamiziba daghebara damɨva dar gavgavimɨn ikian kogham. Puvatɨ. Me Ikiavɨra Itir God mɨgeir mɨgɨrɨgɨaba bar dar gɨn mangɨva, ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuim iniam.
